translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

The official letter of Your Lordship 17 was presented to the government, including the copy of Captain Fileno’s report; and, having reviewed its contents, there is nothing to add in response except to reiterate the orders issued on the 17th and 18th of the current month. No communication has been received regarding the force that appeared in Taquari, which might suggest either that it remains stationed there or has retreated, which will not be possible given the advance of the one that proceeded to Bagé.

God guard Your Lordship  
Secretary of War Affairs in Caçapava, March 19, 1840  
Most Illustrious Sir Colonel João Antônio da Silveira  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre
